CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Account.CRM_Person__r.HOT_DegreeOfHearingAndVisualImpairment__c, "Hearing impaired or deaf"), "Hørselshemmet/døv (ftrl. § 10-7 f)", IF(ISPICKVAL(Account.CRM_Person__r.HOT_DegreeOfHearingAndVisualImpairment__c, "Deafblind"), "Døvblind (ftrl. § 10-7 g)", null))
CustomField.label: Degree of Hearing and Visual Impairment
